title: French-Mediterranean typography
content:
Can anyone recommend a typeface that evokes a French-Mediterranean theme?

thanks
author: designtn

comments.content: [Malaga](http://web.archive.org/web/20100607041523/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=207) by Xavier Dupré. French designer, Spanish name … :°)
Or are you looking more in the display direction?

Hi there:

Sacre Blue

Mostra

anything by Mario Felliciano

Atlantica

Gigi

Emma Script

House Maid

Pablo

Didot and Bodoni

I could go on and on... tell us what do plan to do with your fonts that evoke the Côte d'Azur

Mikey

Retiro by Jean-François Porchez (not for retail, for the time being, unfortunately)

[http://www.porchez.com/article/392/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100607041523/http:/www.porchez.com/article/392/ "http://www.porchez.com/article/392/")

Anisette is also a very good idea for French-Mediterranean style. Very "Pastis"-style.

[http://www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/view/Anisette](http://web.archive.org/web/20100607041523/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/view/Anisette "http://www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/view/Anisette")

and Anisette petite as well

[http://www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/view/AnisettePetite](http://web.archive.org/web/20100607041523/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/view/AnisettePetite "http://www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/view/AnisettePetite")

nec scire fas est omnia
